global-search-desc: Search within wikitext across all Wikimedia Foundation wikis.
important-notes-lag: Results may be lagged behind production, usually by around $1 {{PLURAL:$1|minute|minutes}}.
important-notes-specific: Make your search terms as specific as possible. The more results they return, the longer you will have to wait.
namespaces-desc: Comma-separated list of namespace IDs. Leave blank for all namespaces.
splash-login-desc: This tool allows you to do keyword and source regular expression searches across all Wikimedia Foundation wikis, using the $1 service.
splash-login-required: Because this tool can perform expensive long-running queries, login is required.
